name: Hinotori Rhythm Game
description:
I created a fully playable game version of @zeth_total's Hinotori rhythm game animation featuring Kiara and Gura of Hololive EN.

8-bit music arranged by Fabulous Reindeer

Original Hinotori song by Takanashi Kiara of Hololive EN

My twitter @nullrefrepro

Controls (same as Muse Dash keyboard defaults)

  • D/F - Jump and Air attack beats on the top row.
  • J/K - Ground attack beats on the bottom row.
  • D/F + J/K at the same time to attack double beats that occupy both top and bottom rows.
  • Mash D/F/J/K to land as many hits as possible on the centre beats between the top and bottom rows.
  • Escape/Q Quit to menu for quick retry.

Muse Dash is the property of PeroPeroGames, I have no intention of upsetting the creators/fans of the original game this short demo is based upon. I created this just for fun and to learn more about the intricacies of developing a rhythm game, and have no plans to further develop it beyond a few bug fixes/refinements and perhaps a new difficulty setting or two.
